pr_title: [GEOS-9719] GeoJSONPPIO should use global number of decimals setting

timeline.message:
[GEOS-9719] GeoJSONPPIO should use global number of decimals setting

Addresses the rounding issue for the GeoJSON WPS PPIO identified here:
https://gis.stackexchange.com/questions/272009/geoserver-increase-the-precision-of-the-json-return-of-wps-call

Signed-off-by: Jim Hughes <jnh5y@ccri.com>

Changed registration to use Spring so that the unit tests may pass.

timeline.bodyText: I would usually handle this in a try/finally block for extra safety...

replies.bodyText:
yeah, this was based on testing changes coordinate reference system configuration (so any failure produced so many other failures it was hard to track down.)
Keep in mind if you run into multi-threaded testing problems in the future.
